overview:
Richard Johnson, Senior VP of US Media Sales for Adify, is an online advertising veteran having been in the industry for almost 10 years. Most recently he grew revenue and built sales teams for WeatherBug and ValueClick Media. Prior to this, Johnson was involved in the early stages of rich media advertising where in the late â€˜90â€™s, he designed interactive video and rich media campaigns for Bank of America and MyFamily.com. Johnson also ran sales for MyFamily.com and PhotoPoint. In this role, he will be focused on building out the Adify media sales team with the objective of matching national brand advertisers with vertical networks powered by Adify. Richard Johnson has attended Boston University and holds a B.A. in Political Philosophy from Franklin Pierce College.

Source: Adify Management Team Site
